stack:stack.stack:script:
getent group prometheus > /dev/null || groupadd -r prometheus getent passwd prometheus > /dev/null || useradd -r -g prometheus -d /var/lib/prometheus \ -s /sbin/nologin -c "prometheus user" prometheus
mkdir -p /var/lib/prometheus chown -R prometheus:prometheus /var/lib/prometheus
systemctl enable node_exporter
